name: Single/Triple/Five Progression
time_per_session_breakdown: 3 sets x <1 min total each + rests
overview_and_execution: Perform a heavy single, rest 2-3 min, reduce weight ~10% for a triple, rest, reduce ~10% again for 5 reps. Over time, attempt to increase each load or reduce the percentage drop.
example_application: Deadlift: 1×365, 3×325, 5×295. Next session aim heavier single or smaller drop for triple/five.
important_notes: Combines heavy strength work with moderate volume. Good for intermediates short on time. Avoid failing the single.
